name: Cure Moderate Wounds
text: This spell functions like cure light wounds, except that it cures 2d8 points of damage + 1 point per caster level (maximum +10).
mythicText: The damage cured increases to 4d8 points of damage + 2 points per caster level (maximum +20). The spell cures up to 2 points of ability damage if the target is a living creature. The target chooses what types of ability damage are cured.
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则减半 (无害); 见文本
text_zh: 该法术的功能如同‘治疗轻伤 (cure light wounds)’一般，不过它能治疗 {2d8+CL (最高+10)} 点伤害。
mythicText_zh: 该法术治愈的伤害增加至4d8点 + 每施法者等级2点（最高+20点）。若目标为活物，则法术能够治愈至多2点属性伤害。目标可以选择哪种类型的属性伤害会得到治愈。
